title: Four Scenic Road Trips Tailored for This Spring
sub_head: With the help of seasoned roadtrippers, we’ve designed four driving itineraries in the U.S. with highlights that maximize the season, from a wildflower bonanza in California to an arty desert campground in Colorado
body:
WE ASKED four road-trip vets to help stitch together itineraries optimal for spring. Each one is designed for a particular type of traveler—an outdoors aficionado, an art lover, a dedicated chowhound and a history buff who doesn’t mind a little mud—but they’re all rich enough for roadtrippers of all stripes.
Santa Fe, N.M. to Denver: 715 Miles
